attributes.action: stop our council houses from being sold to private housing associations
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is becoming more and more frequent that council properties are being transferred to private ownership with housing associations. Council housing was intended to provide cost effective housing for those people not in a position to buy a home, and should remain under a council's control.  They should not pass the buck when they can't manage their own budget, bribing people with promises of new fixtures and fittings if they transfer their stock.
